Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership in the New York city employees retirement system to Gregory Dunlavey and Angelo Pisani
Summary: Grants retroactive membership in the New York city employees' retirement system to Gregory Dunlavey and Angelo Pisani.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive membership in the New York city employees' retirement system to Gregory Dunlavey and Angelo Pisani
